bug.author: jwdinius
bug.summary: mlpack-3.1.1 fails to compile with Ensmallen 2.1.0 release
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue description</denchmark-h>
When trying to use build mlpack 3.1.1 with Ensmallen 2.1.0, I receive the following compiler error: <denchmark-code>/mlpack-3.1.1/src/mlpack/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.cpp: In member function 'void mlpack::matrix_completion::MatrixCompl etion::Recover(arma::mat&)': /mlpack-3.1.1/src/mlpack/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.cpp:95:46: error: no matching function for call to 'ens::LRSDPFuncti on<ens::SDP<arma::SpMat<double> > >::GetInitialPoint()' recovered = sdp.Function().GetInitialPoint(); ^ In file included from /usr/local/include/ensmallen_bits/sdp/lrsdp.hpp:18:0, from /usr/local/include/ensmallen.hpp:104, from /mlpack-3.1.1/src/mlpack/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.hpp:16, from /mlpack-3.1.1/src/mlpack/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.cpp:13: /usr/local/include/ensmallen_bits/sdp/lrsdp_function.hpp:97:18: note: candidate: template<class MatType> const MatType& ens::LRSDPFunctio n<SDPType>::GetInitialPoint() const [with MatType = MatType; SDPType = ens::SDP<arma::SpMat<double> >] const MatType& GetInitialPoint() const ^ /usr/local/include/ensmallen_bits/sdp/lrsdp_function.hpp:97:18: note: template argument deduction/substitution failed: /mlpack-3.1.1/src/mlpack/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.cpp:95:46: note: couldn't deduce template parameter 'MatType' recovered = sdp.Function().GetInitialPoint(); ^ [ 29%] Building CXX object src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/methods/neighbor_search/unmap.cpp.o src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/build.make:927: recipe for target 'src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_com pletion.cpp.o' failed make[2]: *** [src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/methods/matrix_completion/matrix_completion.cpp.o] Error 1 make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs.... CMakeFiles/Makefile2:301: recipe for target 'src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/all' failed make[1]: *** [src/mlpack/CMakeFiles/mlpack.dir/all] Error 2 Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed make: *** [all] Error 2 The command '/bin/bash -c cd mlpack* && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DDEBUG=OFF -DPROFILE=OFF -DBUILD_PYTHON_BINDINGS=OFF -DBUIL D_TESTS=OFF .. && make -j2 && make install' returned a non-zero code: 2 </denchmark-code>

Image failed to build; see original error for info.

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. I thought that this could not happen due to our build/test setup but I see that we must have a "hole" somewhere. I'll look into both of these things and should have a fix for both tonight.

I did the following:
Opened mlpack/ensmallen#131 to fix a few bugs that happened Opened #2011 to handle compatibility from the mlpack side Created a job that runs on ensmallen PRs to ensure that it will still compile mlpack master, to ensure this doesn't happen again
Thanks again for the report. üëç
